fields.Purpose: The purpose of the Oral Presentations and Evaluation Committee meeting is to allow committee members an opportunity to view the firms oral presentations, review, evaluate, and consensus score the presentations in response to RFQ 21277,2 Progressive Design Build Services for South County Potable Water Transmission Main.
fields.Location: County Center - 25th Floor - Procurement Conf. Room in downtwon Tampa
fields.Method: The evaluation committee will meet in-person; all others who need live access to the meeting will be sent invitations to join the meeting. Provisions have been made for any member of the public desiring to have access to view the meeting.
fields.MeetingName: Oral Presentations & Evaluation Committee Meeting for RFQ 21277,2

fields.Purpose: The purpose of the Evaluation Committee meeting is to allow committee members an opportunity to review, evaluate, and consensus score proposals received in response to RFP 21610 Design Build Services for South County Advanced Wastewater Treatment Facility Expansion
fields.Location: County Center - 25th Floor - Procurement Conf. Room in downtwon Tampa
fields.Method: Evaluation Committee Meeting for RFP 21610 Design Build Services for South County Advanced Wastewater Treatment Facility Expansion
fields.MeetingName: Evaluation Committee Meeting for RFP 21610 Design Build Services for South County Advanced Wastewater Treatment Facility Expansion

fields.Purpose: The purpose of the meeting is to further discuss the Technical Evaluation Committees review and recommendations.
fields.Location: County Center - 25th Floor - Procurement Conf. Room in downtwon Tampa
fields.Method: This meeting will be held by means of communications media technology. Provisions have been made for any member of the public desiring to have access to participate and view the meeting.
